resources.string: They are evergreen and are deep rooted (they do not affect sidewalk and driveway) it Is an effective windbreaker used to alleviate noise pollution

They are deep rooted (they do not affect sidewalk and driveway) and it profusely produce flower. it Is also a multipurpose tree (provide good quality charcoal, good timber suited to make furniture, e.t.c)
often simply referred to as its genus name Gliricidia, is a medium size leguminous tree belonging to the family Fabaceae
is a very fast-growing deciduous tree with an open, large, spreading crown; it usually reaches a height of 15 - 20 metres,
